attributes.action: Debate  in the House commons the appointment of Jury process
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To avoid a major political, diplomatic war and public outrage  between France, Britain, Mauritius and Seychelles which involve a number of criminal issues, abuses and involvement in criminal practice - attempted killing not to start court proceeding against the mother of my son born in Angers - Loire, France involving the French government - late President Francois Mitterrand and Priminister John Major. To avoid her being call as a jury and challenge gave very serious church responsibility as reason. We challenge this public appointment.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
